K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:257b-1: a'arya panytsa bidsha ti ka pra dzny'a pa ra mi t'a mu kha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:257b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:257b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:257b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:257b-7: bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-10: rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-14: snang ba dang mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-15: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-18: phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-19: rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-22: nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-23: nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258a-24: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-0: aom byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @258b sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-1: aom kun tu bzang po'i spyod ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-2: aom yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-3: aom 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-4: aom skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-5: aom rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-6: aom 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-7: aom brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-8: aom thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-9: aom rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-10: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-11: aom rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-12: aom las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-13: aom nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phat shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-14: aom 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-15: aom mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-16: aom h'um thams cad la 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-17: aom hr'i: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:258b-18: aom aa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-2: aom aam ba h'um shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-3: aom aem shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-4: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-5: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-6: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-12: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-13: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-012:259a-14: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o //
